last_episode_to_air.name: The Children's Parade
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jim's hospital is being haunted by the ghosts of kids from an abandoned polio ward in the early 1900’s. And the connection of Aidan, Melinda, the Shinies and the Shadows will come to a climax and Melinda and Jim will realize that they know almost nothing about Aiden's powers.

name: Ghost Whisperer
overview: Newlywed Melinda Gordon tries to help the dead communicate with loved ones, but sometimes the messages she receives are intense and confusing. Most of Melinda's efforts involve resolving conflicts that are preventing the spirits from passing over.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The fifth and final season leaps five years into the future, where Melinda's son Aiden is already conversing with ghosts and her husband Jim has become a doctor.

tagline: The dead are talking...and she is listening.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Melinda Gordon just got married; during the dinner she sees something being drawn on the window and she knows it's a ghost. But for the first time, the ghost comes inside her house and that unsettles her. Despite being afraid, she tries to help him reunite with his family and pass along the message he needs her to say.

episodes.name: The Crossing
episodes.overview: A boy who was killed in a collision with a train wants Melinda's help to ensure his mother that his death was not caused by her.

episodes.name: Ghost, Interrupted
episodes.overview: The identical twin sister of a teenage girl requests Melinda to help her apologize to her sister who is a psychiatric patient.

episodes.name: Mended Hearts
episodes.overview: A man killed in a biking accident seeks Melinda's help to save his fiance's life and finding out who received his heart afterwards.

episodes.name: Lost Boys
episodes.overview: Melinda encounters the ghosts of three boys who died in the fire of an orphanage. They must cross over prior to the demolition of the building holding them inside.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: Melinda helps an angry teenage ghost and discovers the secret that is likely to shake up the ones left behind by him.

episodes.name: Hope and Mercy
episodes.overview: In a hospital, Melinda encounters a woman who wants to determine what caused her death during a surgery.

episodes.name: On the Wings of a Dove
episodes.overview: An evil spirit is haunting Jim, causing him to begin doubting his sanity. Melinda must help this spirit, even though he is dangerous, in order to help Jim. .

episodes.name: Voices
episodes.overview: The spirit of the mother of a teenage boy attempts to communicate with her son via white noise. Melinda must find a way to get her messages across.

episodes.name: Ghost Bride
episodes.overview: A ghost of a bride who didn't make it through her wedding night is back with a vengeance haunting her husbands new fiancée to the point of her leaving him at the alter.

episodes.name: Shadow Boxer
episodes.overview: The dead mother of a boxer requests Melinda to assist in getting her son back together with his father. The son is furious because his father caused him not to be able to spent time with his dying mother.

episodes.name: Undead Comic
episodes.overview: After a stand-up comedian commits suicide, he's left in between worlds. Melinda tries to help him find closure.

episodes.name: Friendly Neighborhood Ghost
episodes.overview: The ghost of an elderly man suspects Melinda's new neighbor of killing his granddaughter.

episodes.name: Last Execution
episodes.overview: A hanged man's ghost follows Melinda home from a macabre art installation, haunting her into contacting his troubled daughter.  A woman sues Melinda's paramedic husband, claiming he further injured her whilst performing life-saving CPR.

episodes.name: Melinda's First Ghost
episodes.overview: Melinda is forced to remember how her relationship with her mother became strained after Melinda’s first ghost emerges.  Melinda’s mother could not understand how to deal with Melinda’s gift.  Melinda must reunite with her mother to help the ghost.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Ridge
episodes.overview: Andrea’s friend has gone missing during a hike and Melinda’s called in so she can use her abilities to find him.

episodes.name: Demon Child
episodes.overview: Melinda comes across the spirit of an infuriated young boy, who's terrorizing his mother and baby sister.

episodes.name: Miss Fortune
episodes.overview: When a traveling circus arrives, Melinda meets the bitter ghost of a magician who accuses his envious brother of his death, deemed to have been accidental.

episodes.name: Fury
episodes.overview: Melinda must help the ghost of an African-American man who had been attacked and killed by a white co-worker in the 1970's.  The ghost is haunting the prosecutor who had enough evidence but still failed to file charges against the white co-worker.  Melinda tries to help the ghost find justice and help his son to change his racist views before they're passed on to the next generation.

episodes.name: The Vanishing
episodes.overview: A head injury caused by an accident puts Melinda's abilities at risk. Melinda must deal with the possibility of permanently losing her gift as she attempts to help a young girl whose boyfriend has recently died.

episodes.name: Free Fall
episodes.overview: Melinda experiences a sense of dread when she realizes that a plane is going to crash when the spirits of the pilot and flight attendant contact her.

episodes.name: The One
episodes.overview: After a jetliner crashes Melinda faces the overwhelming task of helping hundreds of passengers crossover.  While Melinda faces this task she finds that the “Wide Brim Man” is working against her.  Melinda must also try to work with the crash investigators who are trying to find out how Melinda knew that the plane was going to crash.

episodes.name: Love Never Dies
episodes.overview: Melinda worries that Andrea is being influenced not to cross over.  Melinda seeks the help of an expert in history and the occult in helping to identify the wide brimmed hat man.

episodes.name: Love Still Won't Die
episodes.overview: A rock and roll enthusiast expands his love to living teens by tormenting them into stealing. Melinda must also deal with the ghost of her scheming ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: Drowned Lives
episodes.overview: When Melinda goes to visit friends who are experiencing problems with their house, she finds the ghost of six-year-old little girl who drowned.  Melinda then tries to help the family of the little girl.

episodes.name: The Ghost Within
episodes.overview: After purchasing a set of ornaments at a flea market, Melinda finds that they are haunted.  Melinda uses the ornaments to meet Dennis’s ghost.  Dennis wants Melinda to reunite his girlfriend with her birth mother.

episodes.name: A Grave Matter
episodes.overview: The ghost of a man who was buried in the wrong grave starts to haunt a cemetery as someone else’s wife is coming to mourn him every night.  Melinda must reconcile the man with his hostile wife and daughter in order for him to be able to cross-over.

episodes.name: The Woman of His Dreams
episodes.overview: Jim has a ghost who died during surgery come to his dreams.  Melinda and Jim find that the ghost, a supermodel, cannot cross-over as she wants to save her little sister from suffering the same destiny.  Jim's friends are frightened by the crazy events that occur at his house.

episodes.name: A Vicious Cycle
episodes.overview: Melinda and Jim's first camping trip is interrupted as Melinda helps the ghost of a woman who left her husband and young daughter.  Before the woman can cross over Melinda must find the woman’s daughter and help her to learn the truth about her parent’s past in order for her to be safe now.

episodes.name: The Night We Met
episodes.overview: The ghost of chef who died in a fire at a Chinese restaurant meets Melinda after the restaurant he died in burns for a second time.  He demands that Melinda go out and find the person that really set the fire he was blamed for.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Ninth
episodes.overview: When Melinda meets a nightclub waiter who has not played his guitar since his friend died, she finds that he is being haunted by two ghosts.

episodes.name: Giving Up The Ghost
episodes.overview: A high school baseball pitcher Justin finds that he is haunted by the former baseball star pitcher.  The ghost is out for revenge on the coach who he blames for his death.

episodes.name: Cat's Claw
episodes.overview: While Melinda is at the University’s botany lab she deals with some telekinetic events while dealing with a plant from Peru that is bleeding.  Melinda finds that she must help a Doctor save herself.

episodes.name: Dead To Rights
episodes.overview: Melinda has trouble talking to a ghost only to find that it's because he is not dead but is in a coma. While Lisa, his wife is in a legal battle against his parents to take him off of the life support. Meanwhile Delia struggles with teaching Ned about closure while also finding closure for herself.

episodes.name: Deja Boo
episodes.overview: Melinda finds that she must stop a ghost who doesn't want to be reincarnated again.  Melinda finds out that someone knows her secret.  Delia has second thoughts about dinner date.

guest_stars.character: Eric Sanborn / John Richmond / Oscar Hodges / Richard Ward
guest_stars.name: David Clayton Rogers

episodes.name: Speed Demon
episodes.overview: Melinda's Jeep breaks down on a deserted road and a young woman who owns an auto shop comes by to help. Melinda meets a ghost who comes to her in the form of a skeleton.  Melinda must first decipher the mysterious code that is linked to the drag racing society. Melinda finds that Ned is involved with the society and needs his help. Ned lies to his mom and sneaks out to go to the drag races. At the end the ghost finds closure and crosses over into the light.

episodes.name: Mean Ghost
episodes.overview: Melinda gives a speech on her career at Grandview High.  While she’s at the school she sees a group of cheerleaders who are having some mean and vicious things happening to them just as their cheerleading semi-finals are approaching in just a few days. Melinda discovers that the dead cheerleader can’t cross over and someone else has been casting spells on the squad.

episodes.name: The Cradle Will Rock
episodes.overview: Melinda accompanies Delia to the local jewelry store so she can get her newly refurbished engagement ring.  An armed robbery occurs while they are in the jewelers.  Later, the ghost of jewelry salesman visits Melinda and she must help him make things right again.

episodes.name: The Walk-In
episodes.overview: A body goes missing from the morgue and Melinda searches for the body.  When the ghost visits Melinda she finds she needs help from Professor Payne to figure it out.

episodes.name: Children Of Ghosts
episodes.overview: Melinda and Jim become foster parents temporarily for a young girl whose mother is missing.  The ghost of the mother comes to Melinda and tells her where Melinda can find her body.  The mother confesses a secret to Melinda and Melinda and Jim set out to help the little girl.

episodes.name: Delia's First Ghost
episodes.overview: Melinda helps Ned deal with a ghost who had just put a scare into him. Melinda also helps a ghost who appears to without any clothes on.  Delia sees that Melinda is once again talking to herself and Melinda decides it’s time to share her gift with Delia.

episodes.name: The Collector
episodes.overview: Melinda meets a man who has the same abilities to see and talk to the dead.  Melinda later learns that he has a different plan for the dead.  A ghost enlists Professor Payne to help Melinda.

episodes.name: The Prophet
episodes.overview: Five accidents, and four signs, something else is going to happen. Melinda becomes concerned for the safety of the people she loves when a ghost prophet shows her visions of the future. The fellow Ghost Whisperer, who Melinda doesn't trust is still in Grandview.

episodes.name: The Gathering
episodes.overview: Melinda visits the Mayor of Grandview and asks him to cancel the memorial dedication they are holding. She speaks to the ghost of a mail person and is looking for a young girl named Kristen. Later, Melinda and Professor Payne search for missing children after their Nanny says that they left with a man named Gabriel. Meanwhile, a mysterious man tries to get Melinda to stop helping the good guys.

episodes.name: The Underneath
episodes.overview: Jennifer goes to Melinda’s store to sell some belongings that came from her deceased parent’s house. Melinda then helps Jennifer with her father who died when she was only a toddler. Someone takes photos of Melinda and they show something suspicious. Melinda finds that she has a hidden connection to Grandview while digging into her families past.

episodes.name: Don't Try This at Home
episodes.overview: Melinda helps a group of college girls after one of their friends dies and begins to haunt them.   Melinda must get Rachel to believe she is not Bloody Mary.

episodes.name: Haunted Hero
episodes.overview: Melinda helps an Iraq war veteran deal with the ghosts that he has brought back with him.

episodes.name: No Safe Place
episodes.overview: Melinda's life is in danger when she tries to help the victim of a stalker.

episodes.name: Weight of What Was
episodes.overview: Gabriel returns to Grandview and Melinda learns more about what is lurking below.

episodes.name: Double Exposure
episodes.overview: Melinda and Professor Payne meet with another college professor who discloses that she had an affair with a student. That student just passed away after an accident.

episodes.name: Unhappy Medium
episodes.overview: Melinda and Jim discuss a kidnapping where the family has contacted a psychic who Melinda believes is telling the family stuff that they want to hear just so he can make money off of them. Melinda goes and talks to the family and finds that something else has happened to the missing girl.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Melinda becomes involved with a couple of ghosts who refuse to cross over after she finds that they are causing trouble for another couple. The ghosts make Melinda play a game of twenty questions.

episodes.name: All Ghosts Lead to Grandview
episodes.overview: While Melinda and Jim are taking care of Becca, Melinda finds that Becca can also see the dead.

episodes.name: Holiday Spirit
episodes.overview: Melinda is at the house of young boy named Riley and as they're hanging Christmas ornaments on the tree, Melinda tries to get him to open up about the strange things he has seen.

episodes.name: Slam
episodes.overview: Melinda helps Ned at his new high were there are several different hauntings.  In the process Melinda finds that she is investigating the intricate world of gossip and romance within the high school before she uncovers the reasons for the hauntings.

episodes.name: First Do No Harm
episodes.overview: Melinda helps a ghost who blames Jim for his untimely death in an explosion.

episodes.name: Home But Not Alone
episodes.overview: Ned's girlfriend thinks she is being haunted by her father. Melinda tries to help keep the family together.

episodes.name: The Gravesitter
episodes.overview: After graffiti is repeatedly painted on Melinda's shop doors, she seeks out the town blogger convinced he is the one causing the mischief in an attempt to expose her. Melinda is forced to encounter the dark side of Grandview in order to help the latest ghost cross-over.

episodes.name: Horror Show
episodes.overview: Melinda investigates the haunting of a college student after the student sees a horror movie.

episodes.name: Deadbeat Dads
episodes.overview:
Professor Payne meets Elliot, the brilliant son of one of his old girlfriends. When Payne discovers that the boy is almost 10-years-old, he realizes he may be the boy's father. This angers his deceased wife. After watching Payne, Elliot, and the boy's mother, Melinda tells Jim she wants to have a baby. 

Melinda meets with Carl, a detective she hired to trace her father's whereabouts after he left Melinda and her mother. Carl stops by the house to give her the little bit of information he collected on her father and something strange happens to him while he talks to Melinda.

episodes.name: Stranglehold
episodes.overview: When Melinda is given the file number of a murder case for which her father was lead prosecutor in 1979. With the file, Melinda sets out to find whether or not the victim's murder or the trial is linked to her father's disappearance.

episodes.name: Pater Familias
episodes.overview: Melinda discovers the truth about her family's past through a series of bodily possessions.

episodes.name: Firestarter
episodes.overview: After being rescued by Jim from a fire at the Rockland University, Eli has a near death experience.  Melinda becomes friends with Eli and soon discovers that they both have the same abilities.

episodes.name: Big Chills
episodes.overview: Melinda reconnects with old high-school friends after one of their classmates dies mysteriously.

episodes.name: Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: Melinda tracks down a ghost who is targeting girls on a social-networking Web site.

episodes.name: Save Our Souls
episodes.overview: Melinda and Jim go away on a romantic cruise and Melinda comes into contact with an angry ghost who haunts a newlywed couple.

episodes.name: Bloodline
episodes.overview: Melinda investigates the sudden death of a high-school athlete whose ghost is following a family that is not her own.

episodes.name: Imaginary Friends and Enemies
episodes.overview: When a child's imaginary friend disrupts a wedding, Melinda tries to calm the ghosts causing chaos.

episodes.name: Threshold
episodes.overview: While facing dramatic personal changes, Melinda struggles to help a desperate teenage ghost, feeling her gift of being able to talk to the dead is no longer helpful.

episodes.name: Heart & Soul
episodes.overview: Melinda tries to help a man suffering from amnesia regain his memory.

episodes.name: Pieces of You
episodes.overview: Melinda discovers the secret of a girl who has been missing for 12 years.

episodes.name: Ball & Chain
episodes.overview: Melinda helps a disillusioned ghost out with marriage problems.

episodes.name: Life on the Line
episodes.overview: Melinda helps a family in turmoil after a freak accident. Meanwhile, Delia has her first haunting and discovers why sometimes it's easier to be a skeptic than a believer.

episodes.name: This Joint's Haunted
episodes.overview: Melinda will face her greatest fear as she embarks on a road trip with Sam. Along the way, they encounter some troubling incidents.

episodes.name: Body of Water
episodes.overview: Finding a mass grave in a local lake has caused a mass haunting over one man which Melinda must face.

episodes.name: Slow Burn
episodes.overview: Melinda must deal with the spirit of an overbearing mom who is suppressing a deep and dark secret.

episodes.name: Greek Tragedy
episodes.overview: Sam may discover Melinda's secret and rethinks his relationship with her after she's caught in several lies.

episodes.name: Ghost Busted
episodes.overview: Melinda reveals her gift to Sam, but his reaction is not what she had expected.

episodes.name: Delusion of Grandview
episodes.overview: Melinda and Sam's relationship hangs in the balance after Melinda shares some devastating news.

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Sam has a brush with death as he risks his life to save Melinda from harm.

episodes.name: Thrilled To Death
episodes.overview: A young woman in Eli's apartment building is being haunted.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: A ghost causes problems for a television show that is filming in the Grandview town square.

episodes.name: Cursed
episodes.overview: Melinda discovers that the spirits trapped in a dollhouse have other plans.

episodes.name: Endless Love
episodes.overview: As Melinda and Jim start making wedding plans, Melinda notices one of Ned's friends from school has a ghost attached to her which thinks it's a vampire.

episodes.name: Book of Changes
episodes.overview: Jim and Melinda's wedding is overtaken by an ambitious wedding planner while Melinda deals with dreams that seem to threaten her child. Elsewhere, Eli's ex, Zoe, is caught up in a book sale with tragic consequences.

episodes.name: Birthday Presence
episodes.overview: Melinda gives birth to a baby boy who has inherited her gift of seeing spirits. However, the baby has one important difference in gift which will have extreme consequences.

episodes.name: See No Evil
episodes.overview: Melinda looks into a chain email that appears to be preying on the citizens of Grandview.

episodes.name: Till Death Do Us Start
episodes.overview: A messy family reunion ensues after Eli's father suffers from a heart attack. Eli also has a reunion with his mother who has been unable to cross over for ten years

episodes.name: Do Over
episodes.overview: Melinda helps a dead doctor who is reliving a surgery that went wrong.

episodes.name: Cause for Alarm
episodes.overview: Melinda help Eli with a patient who is being haunted by his sister. Meanwhile, Jim and Melinda have concerns over something Aiden has been seeing.

episodes.name: Head Over Heels
episodes.overview: The Headless Horseman from the Legend of Sleepy Hollow is haunting Melinda and when the legendary book mysteriously shows up at Aiden's school Melinda becomes worried for Aiden's safety.

episodes.name: Devil's Bargain
episodes.overview: Jim, surprised by his colleague's nonchalance to a paranormal encounter, suspects that he is involved in a med student's sudden disappearance. Meanwhile, Melinda senses trouble when Aiden continues to mention his fear of "the shadows".

episodes.name: Dead Listing
episodes.overview: Melinda is pulled into a murder mystery by a real estate power couple when a ghost leads her to his own corps.

episodes.name: Lost in the Shadows
episodes.overview: When the ghost of a little girl who passed away from leukemia befriends Aiden and threatens Melinda to stay out of her way, Melinda worries for her son's safety.

episodes.name: Excessive Forces
episodes.overview: When the ghost of a high school boy accuses a Grandview cop of murdering him, Melinda is convinced that his death wasn't a mere skateboarding accident.

episodes.name: Dead Air
episodes.overview: Melinda must help Ned stop a ghost out for revenge when the Grandview radio station broadcasts the humiliating secrets that led to his death.

episodes.name: Blessings in Disguise
episodes.overview: Melinda must discover the truth hidden within a family before it threatens to tear the her family apart.

episodes.name: Living Nightmare
episodes.overview: When Melinda discovers a family secret, madness grips the hospital and the town when a ghost who is making no sense haunts a patient who's making even less. Melinda must unravel the mystery behind a madness that grips Jim's (David Conrad) hospital - and the rest of Grandview.

episodes.name: Dead to Me
episodes.overview: Ned's Occult Anthropology professor is stalked by the ghost of a secret admirer. Ned tries to use a Ouija board to help solve the mystery but instead is warned that someone they know is going to die soon.

episodes.name: Implosion
episodes.overview: A ghost who knows of a hidden munitions dump with unexploded bombs confides in Melinda that one of those bombs is missing and in the wrong hands

episodes.name: Old Sins Cast Long Shadows
episodes.overview: Dark forces are fighting for the soul of a little girl that cannot escape the haunted house she has been trapped in for years.

episodes.name: On Thin Ice
episodes.overview: Damon is a graphic (comic) novelist; kind of hip and edgy, he is being haunted by the ghost of a teen boy as he is ready to release his new novel and strange things start to happen to him and the ghost is tormenting him until Melinda can help him find out who is trying to stop his work, while the things the ghost does to Damon are predicted in his comics.

episodes.name: Dead Eye
episodes.overview: When a confused ghost dressed as a clown begins haunting Melinda's house, it's up to her and Eli to look for answers in the ghost's final case as a private investigator - a love story involving greed and suspicion.

episodes.name: Lethal Combination
episodes.overview: When Aiden is put in danger, Melinda won't accept anything but the truth and sets out on a shocking investigation into the life of an angry murdered ghost. Meanwhile, Jim is caught snooping through files in the file room at his work by the morgue coroner Dr. Mavis.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: Henry was 18 years old when he was killed, with a gunshot wound in his chest. In life he was a decent boy from a wealthy, loving family, whose parents believed that he should earn his own living and not rely on their handouts. He masterminded his own kidnapping with a friend of his, and seems relieved to be able to explain to his mother, via Melinda, that he's felt guilt and remorse ever since.

episodes.name: Dead Ringer
episodes.overview: When the ghost Melinda is trying to help suddenly turns up alive, she finds herself in the middle of a dangerous revenge plot and battling enemies she was unaware she had.

episodes.name: The Children's Parade
episodes.overview: Jim's hospital is being haunted by the ghosts of kids from an abandoned polio ward in the early 1900’s. And the connection of Aidan, Melinda, the Shinies and the Shadows will come to a climax and Melinda and Jim will realize that they know almost nothing about Aiden's powers.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The fifth and final season leaps five years into the future, where Melinda's son Aiden is already conversing with ghosts and her husband Jim has become a doctor.
